review: You need a high-speed internet connection for this as it buffers poorly.  Tried a voice search within Youtube and it redirected me to the Instant Video app offering to let me buy what I was searching for.  The voice search has great potential but the redirects to Amazon "buy this now" areas are maddening.  Got this as a gift or I would have returned it.  Hey, I love Amazon.  I have a Kindle for reading and 2 Fire HDX's for my family.  Sad that this device needs high speed internet. The Fire HDX lets you pre-download if your connection is slow.  Not this device.  It tells you your connection is slow and offers no help.  Have updated the firmware and it got a little better.  Here's hoping the next firmware fixes things, I'd be happy to up my rating!

review: This awesome device has actually got me to sit back on the couch and relax, again.  I've been stuck in my computer chair for a long time, since it was the only place I had all the features I want available.  Having so much fun with the games, Prime Movies/shows, Netflix, Prime Music, and viewing my personal photos and videos.One thing I wish for: being able to sort my Watch List by Prime Only.  I wouldn't be surprised if this feature gets added in later.
